Its a funny story but its how this years Big Sky Preseason Freshman of the Year got her start with the game PERIOD

On Aug PERIOD  Adams a true freshman midfielderforward on the Montana soccer team was awarded the honor PERIOD Its the first time in head coach Mark Plakorus three years that a Grizzly has earned the recognition PERIOD

When Plakorus casually mentioned it to Adams at a practice she thought he was joking PERIOD Plakorus said the first thing he liked about Adams was her competitiveness and desire to give everything she had PERIOD

 Plakorus said. this recognition didnt come as a surprise to freshman defender Chanelle Pederson PERIOD

Pederson played club soccer with Adams for six years and watched Adams refine her skills over the years PERIOD Pederson said Adams has evolved into a confident leader PERIOD

Adams chose the University of Montana as her future college because of the town and people PERIOD She said she loves the college town atmosphere and felt Plakorus believed in her more than other coaches PERIOD

Its Adams tenacity and passion for the sport that will help her overcome her first collegiate soccer hurdle ACL recovery PERIOD

Last November Adams tore her anterior cruciate ligament and meniscus PERIOD Before she came to Missoula she was cleared by her physical therapist but Griz athletics doctors wanted her to wait PERIOD

To help with her recovery Adams was fitted with a knee brace and is limited to noncontact drills in practice PERIOD She said she hopes to be cleared before conference and feels strong PERIOD
